attributes.title: Needs updates
attributes.review: Does trump have a different app? This one took like 4 hours to download and  can’t open it. Every time I try to open it, it crashes and my entire phone shuts off. I think they need to do updates on it or something.

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: this app completely made my phone 100% slower and i thought it was my phone! so I tried restarting my phone and it would work every so often but after I deleted this app on my phone we came faster 100%

attributes.title: you get rid of tik tok we will get rid of your life Simpson’s style
attributes.review: DONT OPEN THIS APP I saw a big fat white nasty man he came  up all big on my screen and it scared me so bad💞🧚🏻 I started to cry🧚🏻‍♀️🥰 and through my phone all the way to the moon 🌙  where trump belongs 👏🏻so trump when am I getting my 1000 bucks 🤦🏼‍♀️💕 DO NOT OPEN THIS APP OF YOU DO NOT WANT YOUR PHONE SHATTERED🧚🏻‍♀️🥰🌵💝😳.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER !!! 🤢🤮
attributes.review: i am honestly so disappointed in the results of this app . the app kept messing up and kicking me out of it . then my phone started glitching when i opened instagram , so then i tried snapchat and it still did the same thing . this app is terrible !! DO NOT DOWNLOAD !!! it causes VIRUSES on your phone .

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!!!
attributes.review: Don’t ever download this app! I opened it up and allowed push notifications, and immediately received a notification with a slur on the hour. I, a MAGAt, would love to see more. I just don’t believe there was ENOUGH hate and fascist propaganda spewing from the app! Keep hating and Make America Whit...Great Again!!! 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🚔🚔🚔♥️♥️♥️

attributes.title: barinwashing.
attributes.review: this app brainwashes kids and adults. The app is not a good one. i opened the app and there was an orange screen then i said “oh wow look its trump” then this app tried to kill me because it had a gun pointed to me through my screen. i almost died. never again will i ever support our ✨amazing✨ president.

attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: Was so excited to download this app and support the president, but It was so glitchy and poorly made. My phone kept crashing and even at one point completely turned. I just want to support the orange. There were also way too many ads as well as gross propaganda. Ewww anyways. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP.

attributes.title: Wouldn’t open!
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to try to get tickets to Trumps next tally, but the application wouldn’t even open!! I tried re-downloading it and turning my phone off and on but nothin helps! I contacted the help service and didn’t get any reply. No point to the app, save ur breathe🤦🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: Made my phone crash
attributes.review: It takes up so much storage and made my phone stop working. Now every time i try to open it, the app just closes automatically or comes up with a glitchy white screen with random text.

attributes.title: Disgusting & anti Christian
attributes.review: I got this and had to delete it right way. It totally goes against all my Christian values and morals mainly because that man is the antichrist. I will be attending church many more times this week looking for safety in the lords house from the sins that I just committed. Don’t do it please now is not the time to temp the lord.
